FuncDef: This command reloads imported certificate or key file or both at the same time. This command is typically used to update certificate/key file without shutting downipsec-tunnel/ipsec-gw/cert-profile/ca-profile. Note thattype certandtype keywill be deprecated in a future release. Usetype cert-key-pairinstead. Instead oftype certusetype keyinstead.
CLIs: reload type { cert | key | cert-key-pair } <filename> [ key-file <filename> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to reload a certificate file.
Specifies to reload a key file.
Specifies to reload a certificate file and its key file at the same time.
Specifies the file name of imported certificate or key.
Specifies the key filename. IF the cert-key-pair is enabled, the filename is the imported filename of certificate, key-filename is the imported key file.
